title: CCRAS Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS) has published the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, B.E/ B.Tech, and M.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the CCRAS Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can atten...
